original: Akusalaṁ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam āsavañca iva āsava sampayuttañca dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ āsavaḥ ca iva āsava sampayuttaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)

original: Akusalaṁ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam āsava sampayuttañca iva no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca akusalaḥ āsava sampayuttaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā eka ārammaṇe ekaṃ pe avigate eka saṅkhitta

original: (Sahajātavārepi …pe… sampayuttavārepi pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vāre pi pe sampayutta vāre pi pañhā vāre pi sabbattha eka

original: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kusalo āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

analyzed: abyākatam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Kusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: kusalam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavañca abyākatam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Akusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca abyākataṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavañca abyākatam āsava vippayuttam sa āsavañca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
